verses.verse: Thus saith <WH559> the LORD <WH3068> to his anointed <WH4899>, to Cyrus <WH3566>, whose right hand <WH3225> I have holden <WH2388>, to subdue <WH7286> nations <WH1471> before <WH6440> him; and I will loose <WH6605> the loins <WH4975> of kings <WH4428>, to open <WH6605> before <WH6440> him the two leaved gates <WH1817>; and the gates <WH8179> shall not be shut <WH5462>; have: or, strengthened

I will go <WH3212> before <WH6440> thee, and make <WH3474> the crooked places <WH1921> straight <WH3474> <WH3474>: I will break in pieces <WH7665> the gates <WH1817> of brass <WH5154>, and cut in sunder <WH1438> the bars <WH1280> of iron <WH1270>:

And I will give <WH5414> thee the treasures <WH214> of darkness <WH2822>, and hidden riches <WH4301> of secret places <WH4565>, that thou mayest know <WH3045> that I, the LORD <WH3068>, which call <WH7121> thee by thy name <WH8034>, am the God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478>.

For Jacob <WH3290> my servant's <WH5650> sake, and Israel <WH3478> mine elect <WH972>, I have even called <WH7121> thee by thy name <WH8034>: I have surnamed <WH3655> thee, though thou hast not known <WH3045> me.
I am the LORD <WH3068>, and there is none else, there is no God <WH430> beside <WH2108> me: I girded <WH247> thee, though thou hast not known <WH3045> me:
That they may know <WH3045> from the rising <WH4217> of the sun <WH8121>, and from the west <WH4628>, that there is none <WH657> beside <WH1107> me. I am the LORD <WH3068>, and there is none else.
I form <WH3335> the light <WH216>, and create <WH1254> darkness <WH2822>: I make <WH6213> peace <WH7965>, and create <WH1254> evil <WH7451>: I the LORD <WH3068> do <WH6213> all these things.

Drop down <WH7491>, ye heavens <WH8064>, from above <WH4605>, and let the skies <WH7834> pour down <WH5140> righteousness <WH6664>: let the earth <WH776> open <WH6605>, and let them bring forth <WH6509> salvation <WH3468>, and let righteousness <WH6666> spring up <WH6779> together <WH3162>; I the LORD <WH3068> have created <WH1254> it.

Woe <WH1945> unto him that striveth <WH7378> with his Maker <WH3335>! Let the potsherd <WH2789> strive with the potsherds <WH2789> of the earth <WH127>. Shall the clay <WH2563> say <WH559> to him that fashioneth <WH3335> it, What makest <WH6213> thou? or thy work <WH6467>, He hath no hands <WH3027>?
Woe <WH1945> unto him that saith <WH559> unto his father <WH1>, What begettest <WH3205> thou? or to the woman <WH802>, What hast thou brought forth <WH2342>?

Thus saith <WH559> the LORD <WH3068>, the Holy One <WH6918> of Israel <WH3478>, and his Maker <WH3335>, Ask <WH7592> me of things to come <WH857> concerning my sons <WH1121>, and concerning the work <WH6467> of my hands <WH3027> command <WH6680> ye me.

I have made <WH6213> the earth <WH776>, and created <WH1254> man <WH120> upon it: I, even my hands <WH3027>, have stretched out <WH5186> the heavens <WH8064>, and all their host <WH6635> have I commanded <WH6680>.

I have raised him up <WH5782> in righteousness <WH6664>, and I will direct <WH3474> all his ways <WH1870>: he shall build <WH1129> my city <WH5892>, and he shall let go <WH7971> my captives <WH1546>, not for price <WH4242> nor reward <WH7810>, saith <WH559> the LORD <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635>. direct: or, make straight

Thus saith <WH559> the LORD <WH3068>, The labour <WH3018> of Egypt <WH4714>, and merchandise <WH5505> of Ethiopia <WH3568> and of the Sabeans <WH5436>, men <WH582> of stature <WH4060>, shall come over <WH5674> unto thee, and they shall be thine: they shall come <WH3212> after <WH310> thee; in chains <WH2131> they shall come over <WH5674>, and they shall fall down <WH7812> unto thee, they shall make supplication <WH6419> unto thee, saying, Surely God <WH410> is in thee; and there is none else, there is no <WH657> God <WH430>.
Verily <WH403> thou art a God <WH410> that hidest <WH5641> thyself, O God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478>, the Saviour <WH3467>.
They shall be ashamed <WH954>, and also confounded <WH3637>, all of them: they shall go <WH1980> to confusion <WH3639> together <WH3162> that are makers <WH2796> of idols <WH6736>.

But Israel <WH3478> shall be saved <WH3467> in the LORD <WH3068> with an everlasting <WH5769> salvation <WH8668>: ye shall not be ashamed <WH954> nor confounded <WH3637> world <WH5769> without end <WH5703>.

For thus saith <WH559> the LORD <WH3068> that created <WH1254> the heavens <WH8064>; God <WH430> himself that formed <WH3335> the earth <WH776> and made <WH6213> it; he hath established <WH3559> it, he created <WH1254> it not in vain <WH8414>, he formed <WH3335> it to be inhabited <WH3427>: I am the LORD <WH3068>; and there is none else.

I have not spoken <WH1696> in secret <WH5643>, in a dark <WH2822> place <WH4725> of the earth <WH776>: I said <WH559> not unto the seed <WH2233> of Jacob <WH3290>, Seek <WH1245> ye me in vain <WH8414>: I the LORD <WH3068> speak <WH1696> righteousness <WH6664>, I declare <WH5046> things that are right <WH4339>.

Assemble <WH6908> yourselves and come <WH935>; draw near <WH5066> together <WH3162>, ye that are escaped <WH6412> of the nations <WH1471>: they have no knowledge <WH3045> that set up <WH5375> the wood <WH6086> of their graven image <WH6459>, and pray <WH6419> unto a god <WH410> that cannot save <WH3467>.

Tell <WH5046> ye, and bring them near <WH5066>; yea, let them take counsel <WH3289> together <WH3162>: who hath declared <WH8085> this from ancient time <WH6924>? who hath told <WH5046> it from that time? have not I the LORD <WH3068>? and there is no God <WH430> else beside <WH1107> me; a just <WH6662> God <WH410> and a Saviour <WH3467>; there is none <WH369> beside <WH2108> me.
Look <WH6437> unto me, and be ye saved <WH3467>, all the ends <WH657> of the earth <WH776>: for I am God <WH410>, and there is none else.

I have sworn <WH7650> by myself, the word <WH1697> is gone out <WH3318> of my mouth <WH6310> in righteousness <WH6666>, and shall not return <WH7725>, That unto me every knee <WH1290> shall bow <WH3766>, every tongue <WH3956> shall swear <WH7650>.

Surely, shall one say <WH559>, in the LORD <WH3068> have I righteousness <WH6666> and strength <WH5797>: even to him shall men come <WH935>; and all that are incensed <WH2734> against him shall be ashamed <WH954>. Surely: or, Surely he shall say of me, In the LORD is all righteousness and strength righteousness: Heb. righteousnesses
In the LORD <WH3068> shall all the seed <WH2233> of Israel <WH3478> be justified <WH6663>, and shall glory <WH1984>.
